trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image key to and from another data type.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于与另一个数据类型转换为映像键的数据的类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: The TreeViewImageKeyConverter class is used to convert key values of an image associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control to and from other data types.
trans-unit.target: TreeViewImageKeyConverter 类用于将转换与关联的图像的关键字值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件与其他数据类型。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基类和[如何︰ 实现类型转换器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an TreeViewImageKeyConverter.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 通常情况下，你并不直接创建 TreeViewImageKeyConverter 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基的类</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>中的示例

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewImageKeyConverter"></xref> class.
Converts the specified object to an object of the specified type using the specified culture information and context.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象转换为使用指定的区域性信息和上下文的指定类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，用于提供格式上下文，用于提取有关从中调用此类型转换器的环境的附加信息。

trans-unit.source: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此参数或此参数的属性可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert, typically an image key.
trans-unit.target: 要转换，通常图像键的对象。

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: 要转换到的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: The specified value cannot be converted to the specified destinationType.
trans-unit.target: 指定 value 不能转换为指定 destinationType 。
